0024 root=fileparts(fileparts(mfilename('fullpath')));
0025 ds=dir(root); ds=ds([ds.isdir]); ds={ds.name};
0026 ds=ds(3:end); ds=setdiff(ds,{'.git','doc'});
0027 subds = { '/', '/private/' };
0028 exts = {'m','c','cpp','h','hpp'};
0029 omit = {'Contents.m','fibheap.h','fibheap.cpp'};
0030 
0031 for i=1:length(ds)
0032   for j=1:length(subds)
0033     for k=1:length(exts)
0034       d=[root '/' ds{i} subds{j}];
0035       if(k==1), comment='%'; else comment='*'; end
0036       fs=dir([d '*.' exts{k}]); fs={fs.name}; fs=setdiff(fs,omit);
0037       n=length(fs); for f=1:n, fs{f}=[d fs{f}]; end
0038       for f=1:n, toolboxUpdateHeader1(fs{f},header,comment); end
0039     end
0040   end
0041 end
0042 
0043 end
0044 
0045 function toolboxUpdateHeader1( fName, header, comment )
0046 
0047 % set appropriate comment symbol in header
0048 m=length(header); for i=1:m, header{i}=[comment ' ' header{i}]; end
0049 
0050 % read in file and find header
0051 disp(fName); lines=readFile(fName);
0052 loc = find(not(cellfun('isempty',strfind(lines,header{1}(1:40)))));
0053 if(isempty(loc)), error('NO HEADER: %s\n',fName); end; loc=loc(1);
0054 
0055 % check that header is properly formed, return if up to date
0056 for i=1:m; assert(isequal(lines{loc+i-1}(1:10),header{i}(1:10))); end
0057 if(~any(strfind(lines{loc},'NEW'))); return; end
0058 
0059 % update copyright year and overwrite rest of header
0060 lines{loc+1}(13:16)=header{2}(13:16);
0061 for i=[1 3:m]; lines{loc+i-1}=header{i}; end
0062 writeFile( fName, lines );
0063 
0064 end
0065 
0066 function lines = readFile( fName )
0067 fid = fopen( fName, 'rt' ); assert(fid~=-1);
0068 lines=cell(10000,1); n=0;
0069 while( 1 )
0070   n=n+1; lines{n}=fgetl(fid);
0071   if( ~ischar(lines{n}) ), break; end
0072 end
0073 fclose(fid); n=n-1; lines=lines(1:n);
0074 end
0075 
0076 function writeFile( fName, lines )
0077 fid = fopen( fName, 'w' );
0078 for i=1:length(lines); fprintf( fid, '%s\n', lines{i} ); end
0079 fclose(fid);
0080 end
